name: Self-Determination Program
description: The Self-Determination Program was passed into law by California in 2013, and aims to closely help individuals with development disabilities increase the quality of their life and exercise their freedoms as an independent individual. Please email or visit the website for more information. For more information on Self-Determination, GGRC has FREE expert coaches who can walk you through the process and answer any of your questions. You can also drop in for NeuroNav's free weekly office hours to as

howToGetIt: - Attend a Mandatory SDP orientation. - Register for the GGRC SDP Orientation HERE. Para participar en español, comuníquese con SDP@ggrc.org. The orientations hosted by GGRC are held on the second Tuesday of every month.
